title: Vase, 1980–81
description: Body of thick greenish glass with air bubble inclusions, in form of elongated ovoid with central aperture and flared curved neck, flat base; decoration of three flying Canadian geese in yellow, green, black, and white, transferred with glass gather; images positioned to create refractive duplication

tombstone.epitaph:
Vase, 1980–81.
1980–81. Glass, blown; photo transferred images. Gift of Toan Klein. 1981-54-1.
